summary: Barbie stars as Merliah, a surfer who learns a shocking secret: she's a mermaid! She and her dolphin friend set out for an undersea adventure to rescue her mother, the queen of Oceana.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Kathleen Barr|Tabitha St. Germain|Peter Mel|Nakia Burrise|Maryke Hendrikse|Emma Pierson|Ciara Janson|Garry Chalk|Nicole Oliver|Alistair Abell|Andrea Libman|Shannon Chan-Kent|Alex Ferris|Ellen Kennedy|Scott McNeil|Melissa Lyons
director: Director: Adam Wood (as Adam L. Wood)
title: Barbie en una aventura de sirenas
